173744.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Fulbe Yulayurat Fulbe.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173744.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「……フルベ　ユラユラト　フルベ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173745.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Amatsuchi yo, cast off the curse!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173745.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「あまつちよ　呪をはらいたまえ！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173746.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Yoi! What a thing to do!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173746.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃん！　なんてことするのっ！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173747.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>If I had been bad at unleashing curses
at people, <pc> I would have
died!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173747.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「人に向かって　呪を放つなんて……
　下手したら　<pc> 
　死んじゃってたよ！！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173748.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Oh my goodness, you're looking well,
Asahi. It's so nice to see you.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173748.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「あらあら　元気にしてはるようね　アサヒ。 
　お目にかかれて　うれしいわぁ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173749.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>By the way, isn't it terrible to call
us murderers?<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173749.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「ところで　ウチのこと　人殺し呼ばわりなんて
　ひどいんと　ちがいますのん？<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173750.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「そ　それは……。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173751.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>There is no way that a promising
newcomer to the Yang Clan would fall
for such a silly trick.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173751.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「陽衆の期待の新人ともあろう　お人が 
　こんな　しょうもない術に　かかるはず
　おまへんやろ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173752.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>It was our way of saying hello, but
now it's really scratchy.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173752.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「ウチなりの　ごあいさつのつもりやったのに 
　えらい　キズつきますわぁ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173753.en: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Let's leave the fun part for now.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173753.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「……お戯れは　ここらにしときましょ。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173754.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>Please don't forget.We will start the
festival soon.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173754.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「どうか　忘れんとくれやす。 
　近いうち　例の祭りを始めますさかい。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173755.en:
<start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>We will invite Yang Clan members to
the event.<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173755.ja: <start_lip_sync n05099 _normal m00001>「そん時は　陽衆の方も　お招きしますえ……。<stop_lip_animation n05099 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173756.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001><pc>! Was everything ok?<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173756.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「……<pc>！　大丈夫だった？<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173757.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I'm glad to hear that. I can't stand
it if anything happens to
<pc>!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173757.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「よ…よかったぁ……。
　<pc>に何かあったら　耐えらんない！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173758.en:
Suddenly, I felt a stirring in my chest, so I followed her.I want to explain about Yoi-chan to you when I'm
done with her.
173758.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「急に　胸騒ぎがして　あとを追ってきたの。 
　ヨイちゃんのこと……お役目が終わったら　
　ちゃんと　説明させて。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173759.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>But first, you should go deliver the
Fireproof Charm to Azlan's client.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173759.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「でも　まずは　アズランの依頼人さんに
　火除けの札を　届けてきてあげてよね。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173760.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Come back safe and sound to Yang Clan
Hideout when you're done! Don't
forget!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173760.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「終わったら　陽衆の隠れ家に
　無事に　帰ってきて！　ねっ！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173761.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Thank you for your service to Druid!
Well then~ let's get started<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173761.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「天地雷鳴士のお役目　お疲れさま！！
　それじゃ～　さっそくだけど……<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173762.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ごめんね！！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173763.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Yoi, I underestimated you.I never
thought they would harm you.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173763.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ヨイちゃん……陰衆のこと　甘く見てた。 
　まさか　キミに　危害をくわえるなんて。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173764.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>This is my mistake for not telling
you!So I'll tell you about her.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173764.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「これは　キミに教えておかなかった 
　あたしの失敗！ 
　だから　あの子のこと　話しておくね。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173765.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>The girl in black, Yoi, is the leader
of the druidic yinzhuang.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173765.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「さっきの　黒い服の子……ヨイちゃんは 
　天地雷鳴士　陰衆の頭領で……<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173766.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>He was my best friend!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173766.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「……あたしの　親友だったの！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173767.en:
Yang Clan and Yinshu used to be one family, but in the course of their long history, they were divided into
two different schools.
173767.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「陽衆と陰衆は　元は　ひとつの一族だったけど 
　長い歴史の中で　ふたつの流派に
　分かれちゃったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173768.en:
But ever since we were little, Yoi- chan and I have always been good friends, even being mistaken for
sisters.
173768.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「でも　あたしとヨイちゃんは　小さい頃から 
　ずっと仲良しで　姉妹って
　間違えられることも　あったくらい。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173769.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>And yet, because of the ceremony of
heaven and earth, we could no longer
be friends.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173769.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「なのに……天地の儀があって…… 
　あたしたち　友達でいられなくなった。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173770.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>It's all because of my failure.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173770.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「ぜんぶ　あたしが　失敗したせいなの。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173771.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>From that day on, Yoi started to
resent everyone in the Yang Clan.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173771.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「あの日から　ヨイちゃんは
　陽衆のみんなを　恨むようになっちゃった。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173772.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>But you know what?<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173772.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「でも……でもねっ！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173773.en:
He said that one day they would be able to reconcile and that the Yang Clan and the Yin Shu would be able to
work hand in hand.
173773.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「いつか　仲直りができるって
　陽衆と陰衆は　手を取りあえるって……<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173774.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I believe in you.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173774.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「あたしは　信じてる。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173775.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>Hu~~~.I'm glad we could talk properly.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173775.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「フ～～～。 
　ちゃんと　お話しできて　よかったぁ。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173776.en:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I'm happy for you, Mr. President,
because you are a rising star.We won't
let you get hurt.<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173776.ja:
<start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「キミは　だいじな　期待の新星さんだもん。 
　キズつけさせたりしないよ。<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>

173777.en: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>I will protect <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
173777.ja: <start_lip_sync n05098 _normal m00001>「<pc>のこと　あたしが守るからっ！<stop_lip_animation n05098 CLOSE_MOUTH>
